scripts.build-osx: electron-packager . $npm_package_productName --overwrite --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --ignore='^/media$' --prune --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=media/Icon.icns --app-bundle-id=com.akashnimare.cyclient --sign='Developer ID Application: Akash Nimare (YG56YK5RN8)' --app-version=$npm_package_version --version=$npm_package_electronVersion && cd dist/cyclient-darwin-x64 && zip -ryXq9 ../Cyclent-${npm_package_version}.zip Cyclent.app
